Jović o reprezentaciji: Ne ljutim se ni na koga
01 Nov 2019, 09:45 by Nemanja
Srpski fudbaler i napadač madridskog Reala Luka Jović rekao je u intervjuu za ,,Sportski žurnal“ da za njegov status u reprezentaciji Srbije mediji treba da se obrate selektoru Tumbakoviću.
Jović je posle prijateljske utakmice sa Portugalijom u kojoj je šansu dobio u poslednjih nekoliko minuta, napustio nacionalni tim pred put u Luksemburg, što je izazvalo salvu komentara i polemike u kakvom je odnosu sa selektorom Tumbakovićem.
– Za moj status u reprezentaciji Srbije morate da pitate selektora Tumbakovića. A, što se tiče mog odlaska iz reprezentacije pred putovanje u Luksemburg oko koga se mnogo polemisalo, kazaću da je lekar našeg tima utvrdio povredu zbog koje sam išao privatno na terapije. Da se razumemo, ne mora svaka povreda da bude teška i da zahteva pauzu od mesec dana – rekao je Jović.
Napadač Reala je dodao da se ne ljuti ni na koga i da je svestan da je Aleksandar Mitrović trenutno prvi napadač srpske reprezentacije.
– Ne ljutim se ni na koga, Aleksandar Mitrović pruža odlične partije u Fulamu i uradio je mnogo više od mene za reprezentaciju, tako da razumem zašto ima prednost u odnosu na mene. I ja to zaista ne doživljavam kao nikakav problem – kazao je Jović.
Mladi fudbaler je u sredu postigao svoj prvenac za Real Madrid, što ga je, kako priznaje, lišilo velikog pritiska.
– Nije bilo lako, dugo sam čekao na gol. Imao sam veliki pritisak, ali bio sam svestan svojih kvaliteta i znao da je samo pitanje vremena kad ću ,,proraditi”. Mogu slobodno da kažem da me je motivisala, pre svega želja da pokažem da čelnici najvećeg kluba na svetu nisu pogrešili što su me doveli. Takođe i podrška mojih najbližih, koji su svaki dan uz mene. Prvenac u kraljevskom klubu posvećujem nasledniku Davidu – završio je Jović.

Jovic on the national team: I'm not angry with anyone
01 Nov 2019, 09:45 by Nemanja
Serbian footballer and Madrid striker Luka Jovic said in an interview with the Sporting Journal that his status in the Serbian national team should be addressed by the media to coach Tumbakovic.
After a friendly match with Portugal in which he got his chance in the last few minutes, Jovic left the national team ahead of the trip to Luxembourg, which caused a flurry of comments and controversy over his relationship with coach Tumbakovic.
- You have to ask selector Tumbakovic for my status in the Serbian national team. And, as for my departure from the national team before my trip to Luxembourg, which has been widely debated, I will say that our team doctor found an injury that caused me to go to therapy privately. To be clear, not every injury has to be severe and require a month's break - Jovic said.
The Real striker added that he is not angry with anyone and that he is aware that Aleksandar Mitrovic is currently the first striker of the Serbian national team.
- I am not angry at anybody, Aleksandar Mitrovic provides great games in Fulham and he has done a lot more than I did for the national team, so I understand why he has an advantage over me. And I don't really see it as any problem - Jovic said.
The young footballer made his debut for Real Madrid on Wednesday, which he admits has deprived him of much pressure.
- It wasn't easy, I waited a long time for a goal. I had a lot of pressure, but I was aware of my qualities and knew it was only a matter of time before I "worked out". I can freely say that I was motivated, first of all by the desire to show that the leaders of the biggest club in the world did not go wrong for bringing me. Also the support of my loved ones who are with me every day. I dedicate my debut at the royal club to the heir David - Jovic finished.
